feed.title: Seifert Lab
feed.subtitle: We explore the ultrafast dynamics of spins and magnetism, harnessing terahertz fields to control quantum magnets at the nanoscale. Our research pushes the boundaries of spin‑orbitronics, turning femtosecond phenomena into future applications.

entry.title: New lab in the SupraFAB building

link.title: New lab in the SupraFAB building

entry.content: Excited to share the news about our new lab space in the SupraFAB building of Freie Universität Berlin. It will be home to our newly arriving THz nanoscopy system. Stay tuned - exciting things to come.
